message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. I believe it has immense value for you, and I'm confident we can come to an agreement. My starting price is $1400000.  What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I see in the product.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $1200000 doesn't quite reflect the true value of this product. I'm willing to come down slightly, but  $1300000 is my final offer.  Let's close this deal!

I appreciate your willingness to come down, but I'm still not convinced that $1300000 is the right price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm thinking of $1250000. Let's see if we can meet in the middle.
